title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
description: Our flexible pricing model makes edConnect accessible and customizable for any educational institution. The Basic Plan starts at just $1 per student or teacher per year and includes 4 modules of your choice, along with essential User Management and Push Notifications modules.

additionalModules.title: Additional Modules
additionalModules.description: Schools can further enhance their experience by adding extra modules at either a per-student, per-year rate or a fixed annual fee, based on the module.

volumeDiscounts.title: Volume Discounts
volumeDiscounts.description: We offer 10-15% bulk discounts for larger institutions, school districts, or those opting for three or more additional modules.

longTermCommitment.title: Long-term Commitment
longTermCommitment.description: Schools committing to a 3-year plan enjoy an additional 10% discount on all services.

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.description: As each institution's needs are unique, we're happy to negotiate pricing to find the best fit for your requirements.
